name: Claim Hexes
description: Expand your kingdom's borders by claiming adjacent wilderness hexes through surveying, settlement, and administrative control

criticalSuccess.description: Based on your proficiency, claim this many hexes: Trained (1 hex), Expert (2 hexes), Master (3 hexes), or Legendary (4 hexes). Claim the targeted hex(es) on the map.

success.description: Claim 1 hex. Claim the targeted hex.

special: Can only claim hexes adjacent to existing kingdom territory
